---
title: "Method comparison"
author: "Burak"
date: "September 7, 2015"
output: html_document
---

Method comparison plots:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(mcr)
a <- datasetInput()
    if (is.null(a)) {
      return(NULL)} else {
        names(a) <- c("M1", "M2")
        data1 <- mcreg(a$M1,a$M2)
        MCResult.plotDifference(data1)
      }
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(mcr)
a <- datasetInput()
    if (is.null(a)) {
      return(NULL)} else {
        names(a) <- c("M1", "M2")
        data1<- mcreg(a$M1,a$M2, error.ratio=1, method.reg=input$regmodel, method.ci=input$cimethod)
        plot(data1)
      }
```

Statistics:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(mcr)
a <- datasetInput()
    if (is.null(a)) {
      return(NULL)} else {
        names(a) <- c("M1", "M2")
        data1 <- mcreg(a$M1,a$M2)
        printSummary(data1)
      }
```

R.version.string
